meanings.definition: A member of a band of heroes in Greek mythology who sailed with Jason in the ship Argo in search of the Golden Fleece.
meanings.sent1: The argonauts embarked on a perilous journey to find the Golden Fleece.
meanings.sent2: In the story, the argonauts faced many challenges during their quest.
meanings.sent3: The argonauts' adventure was filled with excitement and danger.
meanings.sent4: Their quest was like a thrilling tale of bravery and discovery, just like the argonauts.
meanings.sent5: The image of the argonauts sailing into the unknown is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: A person who is engaged in a dangerous but rewarding quest; an adventurer.
meanings.sent1: She felt like an argonaut on a daring mission to explore the uncharted lands.
meanings.sent2: The young explorer was determined to become one of the great argonauts of his time.
meanings.sent3: The argonauts of today seek out new challenges and triumph over them.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of opportunities, she saw herself as an argonaut ready to conquer any obstacle.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of the argonauts lives on in those who dare to dream big and take risks.
